about_the_game:
《Love Is Around-Love In The Room VR》, the content of this product has been adapted by INTINY's official licensing, which is a new attempt in the field of VR.

In the VR highlights version, in addition to presenting hilarious footage of the three female leads during shooting, we have also conducted in-depth interviews with the three female leads of the original DLC, providing users with an immersive and interactive experience. Users can choose to interact with one of the girls according to their personal preference, immersing themselves in the 180° VR world and feeling the real heartbeat experience.

What's even more exciting is that the VR highlights version has specially designed exciting sequences for the supporting characters, especially the popular Lao Liu, which will present users with a more vivid and colourful storytelling experience.

Come and step into the 3D VR scene together and feel the brand new experience in virtual reality.
The naive, romantic, ghostly and elfin oxygen girl?

The kindergarten teacher who is extremely contrasting, innocent and cool at the same time?

The intellectually gifted, affectionate and devoted class president of the same class?


ATTENTION
Because the film is shot in 8K resolution, you may need to install 【HEVC video expansion】 in order to experience the normal, otherwise in the game may encounter film lag or can not play the situation, it is recommended to install the plug-in and then restart the game!
